statements: UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET cost = 500.00, mechanic_name = 'John Doe' WHERE vehicle_id = 1234;
UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET inspection_passed = true, maintenance_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 5678;
UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET maintenance_type = 'Oil Change', maintenance_date = '2022-02-15', mechanic_name = 'John Doe', cost = 50.75, inspection_passed = TRUE WHERE vehicle_id = 1;

UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET mechanic_name = 'Alice Smith', cost = 100.25, maintenance_type = 'Tire Rotation', inspection_passed = FALSE, maintenance_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET maintenance_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE vehicle_inspections SET inspection_results = 'Passed' WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET maintenance_type='Oil Change', maintenance_description='Regular maintenance', maintenance_date='2022-05-20' WHERE id=1
UPDATE vehicle_inspections SET inspection_results='Passed', inspection_date='2022-05-15', inspector_name='John Doe' WHERE vehicle_id=3
UPDATE VehicleMaintenanceRecords SET maintenance_description = 'Oil Change' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE VehicleInspections SET inspection_result = 'Pass', inspector_name = 'John Doe' WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
UPDATE VehicleMaintenanceRecords SET maintenance_description = 'Replaced spark plugs and oil change' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE VehicleInspections SET inspection_result = 'Pass', inspector_name = 'John Doe' WHERE vehicle_id = 201;
UPDATE Vehicle SET model='Sedan', year=2022 WHERE vehicle_id=1;
UPDATE MaintenanceRecords SET cost=1250.00, date='2022-05-20' WHERE record_id=101;
UPDATE Vehicle SET year = 2019, make = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
UPDATE Compliance SET status = 'Active' WHERE vehicle_id = 102 AND category = 'Insurance';
UPDATE Vehicle SET Model='Sedan', Year=2022 WHERE VehicleID=1;
UPDATE MaintenanceRecord SET ServiceType='Oil Change', ServiceCost=50.00 WHERE RecordID=1;
UPDATE Vehicle SET Year = 2023, MaintenanceDate = '2023-01-01' WHERE VehicleID = 1;
UPDATE MaintenanceRecord SET ServiceCost = 1500.50, ServiceType = 'Full Engine Service' WHERE RecordID = 1;
